title: Knife, "Traveling Knife", mid–late 18th century
markings: On blade: two crossed swords and a hammer or cross
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Saber-shaped blade, plain bolster. Tapering handle, round in section, with filigree; floral and paisley pattern around a plain silver shaft. Rosette at the top of handle.

exhibitions.title: Feeding Desire: Design and the Tools of the Table, 1500-2005

tombstone.epitaph:
Knife, "Traveling Knife", mid–late 18th century.
mid–late 18th century. Silver, steel, brass. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-274.
